title: Reporting student prevents drug ring and wins gold medal
description: Paul Rogan noticed a drug ring in his school at 9:00 am, 10 July, and reported it to SafeSentry. The Police arrived and caught the criminals, leading to an investigation. Paul Rogan was rewarded with a gold medal for his act.
timeline: Four guys masked in Black are chasing a vehicle

title: Student stops school shooting across 4 states

title: Santa Clara County set to expand 'gun violence strike team'
description: After recent mass shootings in Half Moon Bay and Monterey Park – Santa Clara County is expanding a task force that targets people illegally in possession of firearms. The county calls it a gun violence strike team.
timeline: Four guys masked in Black are chasing a vehicle
involved: Cindy Chavez, Santa Clara County Board of Supervisors

title: Philadelphia shooting: Teenager heroically dies to save friend, mother says
description: Teenager Daujan Brown was walking to the supermarket when the gunfire started. He was killed while trying to get aid for his 13-year-old friend who was shot twice in the leg, his mother, Nashaya Thomas, told a local NBC affiliate.
timeline: Four guys masked in Black are chasing a vehicle

title: Student Reports Lead to Discovery of Illegal Firearms
description: A local high school sophomore reported violent and aggressive postings online and the classmate that posted violent content to authorities and school administrators. This allowed authorities to step in and remove access to illegal firearms.
timeline: Four guys masked in Black are chasing a vehicle

title: City Council Invests $20 Million in School Shooting Security
description: The local city council passed, in a vote 5-0, a budget amendment to invest 20 million dollars in researching security methods
timeline: Four guys masked in Black are chasing a vehicle

title: East Coast State Attorney Generals Announce Support for Tech-Based Solutions to Gun Violence at Schools
description: The Attorney Generals of Massachusetts, Connecticut, Rhode Island, Delaware lead by Attorney General of New York Letitia James, team up to sue for compensation in the form of funding for technological efforts against gun violence
timeline: Four guys masked in Black are chasing a vehicle

title: Nonprofits and School Shooting Prevention Advocacy Groups Fan Out Across Western States, Knocking Doors
description: Organizations such as Everytown, Moms Demand Action, Giffords, launch canvassing campaign across 4 western states, hoping to raise awareness about the security failures of schools and the lack of technology addressing it.

title: Norcal Companies Sponsor Technological Security Efforts for Public Schools
description: Sillicon Valley’s largest companies are deciding to donate and sponsor projects that can improve security systems for schools against gun violence..

title: Shooting of Cotabato town school kids sparks outrage
description: COTABATO CITY, Philippines – A shooting incident in Pikit, Cotabato province has once again shocked the town, leaving school children as the victims of the violence. .

title: World Economic Forum Funds Gun Violence Prevention Efforts
description: As CEOs of Fortune 500 Companies gathered in Davos Switzerland for the World Economic Forum, the issue of gun violence loomed large.
